description: Verify that the User Dashboard page loads correctly when accessing /profile/dashboard with authenticated user
scenario: Logged-in user navigates to their dashboard to view learning progress and cybersecurity achievements
expected_results: Display the complete dashboard with stats overview, progress tracking, and skill analysis
procedure:
1. Login with valid user credentials
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/profile/dashboard
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Dashboard'
5. Verify welcome message with username
6. Check all dashboard sections are visible and properly styled
7. Verify gradient background and responsive layout

description: Verify dashboard displays basic user progress metrics using simplified system
scenario: Dashboard displays user progress data using simplified data structure
expected_results: All dashboard metrics display correctly with basic data structure
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard with user who has completed levels
2. Verify total_xp displays correctly
3. Check completed_levels shows completion status
4. Verify learning_streak shows streak data
5. Check user_rank displays rank information
6. Verify skill information shows basic data
7. Check progress display is functional
8. Test progress_percentage calculation works

description: Verify dashboard page requires user authentication and redirects unauthenticated users
scenario: Unauthenticated user attempts to access dashboard page
expected_results: Redirect unauthenticated users to login page with appropriate message
procedure:
1. Ensure user is logged out
2. Navigate directly to http://localhost:5000/profile/dashboard
3. Verify redirect to login page
4. Check authentication required message or behavior
5. Login with valid credentials
6. Verify successful access to dashboard page
7. Test session timeout scenario
8. Check redirect preservation after login

description: Verify stats overview cards display user progress metrics correctly
scenario: User views four stat cards showing total XP, levels completed, learning streak, and current rank
expected_results: Display four responsive stat cards with proper icons, values, and color schemes
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify four stat cards are displayed in grid layout (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4)
3. Check Total XP card with blue styling and trophy icon
4. Verify Levels Completed card with green styling and target icon
5. Check Current Streak card with orange styling and fire icon
6. Verify Rank card with purple styling and award icon
7. Test card animations with staggered delays (0.1s, 0.2s, 0.3s, 0.4s)
8. Check responsive layout on mobile devices

description: Verify learning progress section displays overall progress and level completion status
scenario: User views their overall learning progress with completion percentage and level grid
expected_results: Display progress bar with percentage and grid of levels showing completion status
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify 'Learning Progress' section in left column (lg:col-span-2)
3. Check overall progress percentage display
4. Verify progress bar with correct width and styling
5. Check level progress grid (grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-5)
6. Verify each level shows completion status (completed/unlocked/locked)
7. Test progress bar animation on page load
8. Check responsive grid layout on different screen sizes
